mean_cn: adj. 生活经验丰富的；世间的，尘世的；  adv. 世故地
mean_en: of or relating to the human world and ordinary life rather than to religious or spiritual matters
sentence: Although he's just ten years old, he's very worldly and has lots of practical knowledge.
sentence_trans: 虽然他只有十岁，但生活经验丰富。
word_etyma: world世界 ＋ ly表形容词 → worldly世间的
